alert.note: Alert for Bakersfield; Buena Vista; Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Coalinga - Avenal; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Fresno-Clovis; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota; Planada - Le Grand - Snelling; South End San Joaquin Valley; Southeast San Joaquin Valley; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley; West Side Mountains South of 198; West Side Mountains north of 198; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 31 at 12:11AM PST until February 01 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A WIND ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM PST THIS MORNING UNTIL 4 AM PST THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sustained south winds 15 to 25 mph, with gusts near 45 mph expected. * WHERE...The Coastal Range and San Joaquin Valley. * WHEN...From 9 AM PST this morning until 4 AM PST Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds may blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust will reduce visibilities at times. Travel will be difficult, particularly for high profile vehicles, such as campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
